docs.abstract: Stern was a visionary who understood that pro athletes were seeking more power in their sports. While other commissioners tried to stop the effort, he used it to his advantage.
docs.snippet: Stern was a visionary who understood that pro athletes were seeking more power in their sports. While other commissioners tried to stop the effort, he used it to his advantage.
docs.lead_paragraph: David Stern came to power in the N.B.A. in the early 1980s at a pivot point for professional sports in the United States.

headline.main: David Stern Saw Where the Sports World Was Headed Long Before It Got There
headline.print_headline: The World Bought the Player-First Vision That Stern Was Selling

docs.abstract: Successive governments have failed to address the risks posed by aging buildings and shoddy construction, leaving millions vulnerable.
docs.snippet: Successive governments have failed to address the risks posed by aging buildings and shoddy construction, leaving millions vulnerable.
docs.lead_paragraph: DURRES, Albania — Still bleeding, the gash on his hand covered in dirty gauze, Xhafer Ahmetaj surveyed the mountain of rubble where his friends had been buried after an earthquake struck.

headline.main: The Lesson of an Albanian Earthquake: The Balkans Aren’t Ready for the Big One
headline.print_headline: Quake Exposed Unpreparedness of the Balkans

docs.abstract: With an election and impeachment trial pending in the United States, North Korea’s leader added elements of caution in his threat of “shocking” action.
docs.snippet: With an election and impeachment trial pending in the United States, North Korea’s leader added elements of caution in his threat of “shocking” action.
docs.lead_paragraph: SEOUL, South Korea — North Korea’s leader, Kim Jong-un, has long threatened to “find a new way” if the United States persists with sanctions. And when North Korea announced his “revolutionary” new way on Wednesday, the strategy revealed both a defiance and a deep caution in confronting President Trump.

headline.main: What Kim Jong-un’s Latest Threats Say About His Trump Strategy
headline.print_headline: Kim’s Saber-Rattling Stops Short of Scuttling Possibility of a Deal With Trump

docs.abstract: With its star, Lupita Nyong’o, in awards contention this season, a look at the clothes that helped tell the story.
docs.snippet: With its star, Lupita Nyong’o, in awards contention this season, a look at the clothes that helped tell the story.
docs.lead_paragraph: You could watch Jordan Peele’s “Us” a dozen times and still not catch all of the symbolism, references and ideas tucked in it. Yes, scissors are clearly a thing, but what’s with that tuxedo T-shirt?

docs.abstract: If you brother-in-law wants to slip your son some moola, just make sure it ends up in the right place.
docs.snippet: If you brother-in-law wants to slip your son some moola, just make sure it ends up in the right place.
docs.lead_paragraph: Lucy writes: My brother-in-law, Johnny, is a wonderful uncle. Too wonderful, actually. Every time we see him, he slips my son some cash, like a slick gangster. My son is 7. He just leaves the cash around the house. I’ve told Johnny to stop giving my ungrateful son money, but he says he likes doing it. Can I make him stop?

headline.main: Judge John Hodgman on Uncle Money Bags

docs.abstract: Tangy and juicy, filled with seasoned herbs and hearty leaves, jingalov hats are a joy to eat.
docs.snippet: Tangy and juicy, filled with seasoned herbs and hearty leaves, jingalov hats are a joy to eat.
docs.lead_paragraph: Rusana Sayadyan threw down a ball of dough the size of a tangerine and rolled it out into a big, floppy disc, lifting the edges to spin it around. Thirteen years ago, she was an apprentice at a bakery in Armenia, learning to make jingalov hats — the football-shaped flatbreads stuffed with a dozen varieties of herbs and green leaves. Now she was here, in Los Angeles — an expert — teaching someone else. She pushed back her puffy white bonnet with the back of her arm and mixed a handful of greens with salt, oil and paprika. After she scooped the mixture onto the dough, she used her fingers to pinch it shut, sealing the greens inside, then flipped the disc onto a hot griddle.

headline.main: These Armenian Flatbreads Stuffed With Greens Are the Perfect Snack
headline.print_headline: These Armenian Flatbreads Stuffed With Greens Are the Perfect Snack

docs.abstract: In Galicia, where the climate and the housing market are cooler, prices remain attractive to native and foreign buyers alike.
docs.snippet: In Galicia, where the climate and the housing market are cooler, prices remain attractive to native and foreign buyers alike.
docs.lead_paragraph: This 19th-century home on three acres is in A Cañiza, a municipality in the Galicia region of northwest Spain, about 10 miles north of the Portuguese border. The house was rebuilt in 2006 as an eight-bedroom, 10-bathroom villa with two one-bedroom cottages — a total of 10,226 square feet of living space. The property, which has a saltwater swimming pool, gardens and balcony views of the Galician mountains and northern Portugal, has been used as an inn.

headline.main: House Hunting in Spain: A Historic Estate For Under $2 Million
headline.print_headline: Gaze Upon a Lush Valley From a 19th-Century Villa

docs.abstract: Interested in the southernmost continent? Here’s a roundup of some of the new ships and itineraries planned for the bucket-list destination.
docs.snippet: Interested in the southernmost continent? Here’s a roundup of some of the new ships and itineraries planned for the bucket-list destination.
docs.lead_paragraph: As the number of travelers cruising Antarctica swells, polar expedition companies are launching sustainable vessels designed for these bucket-list trips.

headline.main: New Cruise Ships to Set Sail for Antarctica

docs.abstract: Congress could do much more to protect Americans who have served their country from predatory for-profit colleges.
docs.snippet: Congress could do much more to protect Americans who have served their country from predatory for-profit colleges.
docs.lead_paragraph: Congress invited predatory for-profit colleges to defraud military veterans when it wrote a loophole into the rules governing federal education aid. The loophole, added to the Higher Education Act in 1998, encouraged the schools to take the education aid of Americans who had served the country while giving them valueless degrees — or no degrees at all — in return.

docs.abstract: The video was created to show off the University of Wisconsin. Instead, it set off a furor, and a reckoning over what it means to be a black student on campus.
docs.snippet: The video was created to show off the University of Wisconsin. Instead, it set off a furor, and a reckoning over what it means to be a black student on campus.
docs.lead_paragraph: [Race affects our lives in countless ways. To read more provocative stories on race from The Times, sign up for our Race/Related newsletter here.]

headline.main: In a Homecoming Video Meant to Unite Campus, Almost Everyone Was White
headline.print_headline: A Racial Divide on Campus, Visible in an Instant
